author: James Martin
method: Place everything in a saucepan and boil gently, uncovered, for 5 minutes.  Allow to cool before refrigerating
ingredients: 200ml/7fl oz white wine vinegar,  400ml/14fl oz water,  1 small cinnamon stick,  2 cloves,  4 cardamom pods, crushed,  1 red chilli, sliced,  1 thumbs ginger, peeled and roughly chopped,  140g/5oz caster sugar,  1 tsp sea salt,  20 dried figs
